template.title: Global heating will shorten the snow season at Australian ski resorts
template.subtitle: Showing the results from modelling of the snow season length by the years 2030, 2050 and 2080 under different climate change scenarios (low emissions, mid emissions and high emissions). Baseline is the average snow season length from 1981 to 2010. The circle is the median of the projection, and the bars go to the maximum and minimum results
template.source: AMRF / ANU / POW. Data approximated from report figure using WebPlotDigitizer

labels.text:
Season shortened dramatically
by 2050 even with low emissions
